Text:
just copy and paste the amtlib.dll file into the root folder works for all programs (program file/adobe/program name) except illustrator 

for illustrator you need to paste it into program file/adobe/adobe illustrator cs4/support files/contents/windows
sorry i forgot to tell you that the setup.exe is in adobe cs4/master collection/adobe cs4 folder
So could you atleast give a description of what programmes are inside? i have been trying to get adobe after effects on my comp but im only 32bit oS so help would be appreciated

sorry i tried ti edit the description, but the function in disabled, it'd my first and i made lots of mistakes on it.

it has the same programs as cs5 http://www.adobe.com/products/creativesuite/mastercollection.html yes that includes After Effects 32bit
Great torrent, downloaded within two hours and had no problem with activation. Thanks!
